# Welcome to *SW 8409: Statistics II*

This book integrates statistical concepts with real-world applications, focusing on equitable data analysis and actionable insights. It is designed for social work researchers, activists, and students seeking to harness the power of data for transformative change.

::: callout-note
I created this list of some really cool [datasets](dataweb.html) for you to review.
:::

The book is built for my [Stats II course](syllabus.html) in the College of Social Work at The Ohio State University.
